Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Deep goblet with a flattened conical base, restricted mouth and simple lip. The surface is uneven and dented. Both surfaces were polished and are of a pinkish-brown colour. The outside surface also bears large black patches that are the result of fire clouding. The flattened base is slightly concave.
